Token.Abstract: MDLDocument represents a user’s document, as described by Mendeley.
The document identifier, as generated by Mendeley.
The document identifier, as generated by Mendeley.
The document DOI (Digital Object Identifier).
The document DOI (Digital Object Identifier).
The type of the document. This is @"Generic" by default.
The type of the document. This is @"Generic" by default.
The title of the document.
The title of the document.
The abstract of the document.
The abstract of the document.
The Mendeley URL of the document.
The Mendeley URL of the document.
The authors of the document stored as MDLAuthor.
The authors of the document stored as MDLAuthor.
The publication of the document.
The publication of the document.
The year of the document.
The year of the document.
The files of the document.
The files of the document.
The group of the document, if it belongs to one.
The group of the document, if it belongs to one.
A Boolean value that corresponds to whether the document is in the user library.
A Boolean value that corresponds to whether the document is in the user library.
Creates a MDLDocument and sends an API creation request using the shared client.

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title of the document.

Parameter.Name: parameters
Parameter.Abstract: Optional parameters of the document.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the created document with its newly assigned document identifier.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The newly-initialized document, with document identifier = nil.

Token.Abstract: Sends an API search request with generic terms using the shared client.
Token.Declaration: + (void)searchWithTerms:(NSString *)terms atPage:(NSUInteger)pageIndex count:(NSUInteger)count success:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *, NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( NSError *))failure

Parameter.Name: terms
Parameter.Abstract: The terms for the search query

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count
Parameter.Abstract: The number of items returned per page.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: an array of MDLDocument objects for the match, the total number of results, the total number of pages, the index of the current page, and the number of items per page.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends an API search request with specific terms using the shared client.
Token.Declaration: + (void)searchWithGenericTerms:(NSString *)genericTerms authors:(NSString *)authors title:(NSString *)title year:(NSNumber *)year tags:(NSString *)tags atPage:(NSUInteger)pageIndex count:(NSUInteger)count success:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *, NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( NSError *))failure

Parameter.Name: genericTerms
Parameter.Abstract: The terms for the search query

Parameter.Name: authors
Parameter.Abstract: The authors for the search query

Parameter.Name: title
Parameter.Abstract: The title for the search query

Parameter.Name: year
Parameter.Abstract: The year for the search query

Parameter.Name: tags
Parameter.Abstract: The tags for the search query

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count
Parameter.Abstract: The number of items returned per page.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: an array of MDLDocument objects for the match, the total number of results, the total number of pages, the index of the current page, and the number of items per page.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a search tagged API request using the shared client.
Token.Declaration: + (void)searchTagged:(NSString *)tag category:(MDLCategory *)category subcategory:(MDLSubcategory *)subcategory atPage:(NSUInteger)pageIndex count:(NSUInteger)count success:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *, NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( NSError *))failure

Parameter.Name: tag
Parameter.Abstract: The tags for the search query

Parameter.Name: category
Parameter.Abstract: The category for the search query

Parameter.Name: subcategory
Parameter.Abstract: The subcategory for the search query

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count
Parameter.Abstract: The number of items returned per page.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: an array of MDLDocument objects for the match, the total number of results, the total number of pages, the index of the current page, and the number of items per page.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a search authored API request using the shared client.
Token.Declaration: + (void)searchAuthoredWithName:(NSString *)name year:(NSNumber *)year atPage:(NSUInteger)pageIndex count:(NSUInteger)count success:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *, NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( NSError *))failure

Parameter.Name: name
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the author for the search query

Parameter.Name: year
Parameter.Abstract: The year for the search query

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count
Parameter.Abstract: The number of items returned per page.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: an array of MDLDocument objects for the match, the total number of results, the total number of pages, the index of the current page, and the number of items per page.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a top documents (papers) API request using the shared client and fetches the response as an array of MDLDocument.

Parameter.Name: categoryIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: If not nil, the identifier of the category, otherwise across all categories.

Parameter.Name: upAndComing
Parameter.Abstract: If true, results apply to ‘trending’ documents.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: an array of MDLDocument objects.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a user library API request using the shared client.
Token.Declaration: + (void)fetchDocumentsInUserLibraryAtPage:(NSUInteger)pageIndex count:(NSUInteger)count success:(void ( ^ ) ( NSArray *, NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger , NSUInteger ))success failure:(void ( ^ ) ( NSError *))failure

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count
Parameter.Abstract: The number of items returned per page.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: an array of MDLDocument objects, the total number of results, the total number of pages, the index of the current page, and the number of items per page.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a user authored API request using the shared client.

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes five arguments: an array of MDLDocument objects, the total number of results, the total number of pages, the index of the current page, and the number of items per page.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. Token.Abstract: Sends an API upload request using the shared client.

Parameter.Name: fileURL
Parameter.Abstract: The local URL for the file to upload.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes no argument.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends an API details request for the current document using the shared client.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the current document with its newly assigned details.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a related documents API request using the shared client.

Parameter.Name: pageIndex
Parameter.Abstract: The page index. O is first page.

Parameter.Name: count
Parameter.Abstract: The number of items returned per page.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: an array of MDLDocument objects.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.

Token.Abstract: Sends a delete document API request using the shared client.

Parameter.Name: success
Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes successfully. This block has no return value and takes one argument: an array of MDLDocument objects.

Parameter.Abstract: A block object to be executed when the request operation finishes unsuccessfully, or that finishes successfully, but encountered an error while parsing the resonse data. This block has no return value and takes one argument: the NSError object describing the network or parsing error that occurred.
